'''Deus Foundry''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during the {{Quest|Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies}}.

==Walkthrough==
# Enter the room and defeat the enemies {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Hydrogunner Legionnaire; Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard}}
# Navigate the two [[Four-Leaf Sigil]]s and climb up the pipe, then go through the room to a large central structure
# Continue southwards and get on the cart, then navigate another Four-Leaf Sigil and climb up the pipe
# Defeat the {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard}} and rotate the glowing device twice
# Proceed southeast with the Four-Leaf Sigil and climb up another pipe
# Defeat the enemies in the room
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire|x=1}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy|Fatui Pyro Agent|x=1}}
#* There is an [[Exquisite Chest]] after the last wave
# Rotate the glowing device thrice, then enter the room again and exit eastwards
#* To get the nearby [[Common Chest]], rotate the floor device such that the cart moves right towards the south, then get on the cart; return using the Four-Leaf Sigil
# Rotate the floor device such that the cart moves left towards the north, then get on the cart
# Use the Four-Leaf Sigil or glide down to the platform and defeat the {{Enemy|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer}}
#* There is a [[Common Chest]] here
# Rotate the glowing device thrice, then go through the door that has opened and navigate the two Four-Leaf Sigils
# Rotate the left floor device once and rotate the right floor device once, then get on the cart
#* If the cart is missed, rotate the left floor device thrice for the new cart
# Enter the room and defeat the enemies
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard; Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard; Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer}}
#* Wave 3: {{Enemy List|Fatui Cryo Cicin Mage}}
#* There is an [[Exquisite Chest]] after the last wave
# Rotate the glowing device 6 times, then glide down to the elevator and enter the elevator
# Exit the elevator

==Chests==
* 2 [[Common Chest]]s
